page.title: 02A Day in my Life (cont)
page.content: MUM GETS OUR DOG,BEN AND WE SET OFF TO SCHOOL.ON THE WAY TO SCHOOL I USELY SEE ELLA IN HER CAR.WHEN I GET TO SCHOOL I HAVE TO WAIT FOR JULIA MY FRIEND.AT 9:00 WE GO INTO SCHOOL.WE TAKE OFF OUR COATS AND PUT DOWN OUR BAGS.WE GO INTO THE CLASSROOM AND MR.BUNTING OUR TEACHER CALLS THE REGISTER.I AM THE THIRD OLDEST GIRL IN THE CLASS.AT 10:30 WE HAVE PLAYTIME. AFTER PLAYTIME WE HAVE P.E.AFTER P.E. WE HAVE ENGLISH.AT 12:00 IT IS DINNERTIME.THE PEOPLE WHO HAVE DINNERS HAVE THERE DINNER BEFORE THE SANDWHICH PEOPLE.DINNER PLAY ENDS AT 1:15 MR.BUNTING CALLS THE REGISTER.AT 1:30 WE HAVE READING GROUPS.AFTER THAT WE FINISH THE WORK FROM THE MORNING.AT 2:30 WE GO OUT TO PLAY.AFTER THAT WE HAVE A STORY.SCHOOL ENDS AT 3:30.ON TUESDAYS I HAVE PIANO LESSONS.WE WALK HOME FROM SCHOOL.WHEN I GET HOME I
